item.title: 9 Lessons I Learned while Doing RL Post-Training for LLMs
item.description: I recently had the chance to experiment with post-training techniques for large language models, a space that has become central to making LLMs useful and controllable in real-world applications. I used Group Relative Policy Optimization (GRPO) from the open-source open-r1 repository, fine-tuning Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct on the coding subset of the Mixture-of-Thoughts dataset.
